meanings.definition: Able to be named or identified.
meanings.sent1: The cute puppy was easily namable by its unique spots.
meanings.sent2: The new species of flower was namable by its distinct color pattern.
meanings.sent3: The namable cat decided to give itself a funny nickname just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The namable constellation in the sky resembled a giant dragon breathing fire.
meanings.sent5: The namable mountain peak stood out against the clear blue sky.
